abstract: Ukrainian authorities arrest senior government officials Sergiy Bochkovsky and Vasyl Stoyetsky during televised cabinet meeting in spectacle meant to lend weight to country's newly aggressive anticorruption campaign; Bochkovsky and Stoyetsky will be charged with embezzlement and other abuses.
lead_paragraph: The director of the emergency services ministry and his deputy were handcuffed at a meeting and face charges of embezzlement and abuse of power.

headline.main: Ukraine Arrests 2 Officials as Nation Watches on TV
headline.print_headline: 2 Ukrainian Officials Arrested on Corruption Charges at Televised Cabinet Meeting

snippet: The director of the emergency services ministry and his deputy were handcuffed at a meeting and face charges of embezzlement and abuse of power.
